body.p:
Henderson Ky Oct the 10 -- 61
Jas W Tate
Assistant Secretary of State of Kentucky
My old Friend,

Allow me to tax your generosity & kindness, to intercede with his Excellency the Govenor -- for the remission of a fine assessed or found against me for fifty ($50 at the June Term of our circuit court. These hard times it would really destroy me very much to pay out So much money for nothing.
I have a very large family to Support & they are all girls & 50 dollars would go fare towards clothing & feeding them through the approaching winter.

I do hope the Govener will remit the fine as I am or was not guilty of the misdemer for which I was fined. for Do What you can & Say to the Govenor that he has it in his power to make or releve a needy family of a burden for which they will allway hold in greatful remembrance
A. H. Talbott to Jas. W. Tate
